name: Saffron Maze
description:
You are stuck in a basement and the only way you can escape is to find the Diamond Room. In order to get to the Diamond Room, you need to step on the teleportation squares on the ground, navigating the various platforms to reach the room at the end. There are a total of three Diamonds: Red, Green and Blue. The Diamond you pick will determine your fate. Throughout the various platforms, you'll see books lying around containing clues that will help you chose the right Diamond. You only have 1 life in this game, so once you get into the Diamond Room, chose wisely. Good luck! 

If you're familiar with Pokemon, yes, this game is indeed inspired by Saffron City Gym. Sadly you won't be seeing Sabrina here.

Gitlab Link: https://gitlab.com/nixisendya/gamejam-csui2019
